version_description:
Welcome to brand new update to Blackjack!

We are proud to introduce a brand new hints system! Not sure what the best move is? Our system will suggest the optimal move based on basic Blackjack strategy.

We hope you like this update and we wish you good luck!

Your favorite Blackjack has a brand new look!

Customize Your Game!

Choose from a range of beautiful card backs and sleek table colors to create the game experience that you want! Just select Themes from the Settings menu to mix and match.

Bet Big!

We’ve added high-value chips to the game to make it easier for you to bet big! Chip values will now scale along with your balance, so if you’re a high roller you can play as big as you want!

Performance Improvements!

We’ve tweaked the game to ensure the game runs smoother than ever before!

We hope you’ll love this new update! If you have any feedback, let us know.

This update to Blackjack brings a number of improvements:

* You can now play in Landscape mode on iPad.
* It's now possible to choose the number of decks in play. Look for the new option in the Settings menu.
* We've added new card animations.
* We've also made various behind-the-scenes fixes and improvements.

We hope you'll enjoy this update! Good luck!

This update to Blackjack brings a number of improvements:

* You can bet even higher with some of our new high-value chips!
* More levels are coming soon!
* A new auto-deal feature to increase game speed.
* We've also made various behind-the-scenes fixes and improvements.

We hope you'll enjoy this update! Good luck!
Visual tweaks to cards and chips, level up bug fixed

- New Chip Selector Animation
- XP and Level Rework
- Daily Challenge Tutorial
- Minor fixes and improvements

- Travel the world and unlock new Blackjack Tables
- Minor fixes and Improvements
